subject: Order SSN3588
description_text:
Hello , 

I have made an order with number SSN3588. You can find attached two different screenshots . I received today a notification to go and collect it myself , which I found weird as the box of a pedal set doesn’t fit the self collecting boxes . Went anyway got it , to find out it’s only the haptics . 

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text:
And that’s the package . Am I about to receive my pedal set ? If yes what’s the tracking number and when ? . I have waited from the 17th of november,when I ordered , until now to get only the haptics ?  

Please inform me asap regarding the rest of my orders 

Thank you 

Spiros Nakos 

Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Spiros Sao,    This is the logistics link for the pedal.  https://www.dhl.de/en/privatkunden/pakete-empfangen/verfolgen.html?piececode=CE326633944DE

Great , thank you so much . Can’t wait !
Sent from my iPhone

>
